> The following list is the latest newbie tasks (keep up to date). > TODO list
> 
> * [ ]   [website][doc] low version of Mysql jdbc driver may cause serious problem #4421
> * [ ]   [code]Improvement][API] Reduce the size of returned data for list interfaces #4466
> * [ ]  [Feature][UI] When the process definition is running, the pop-up box can manually set the global parameters. #4423
> * [ ]  [Feature][UI] add an option to the UI page for saving the workflow definition: whether to go online? online by default #4463
> 
> submit code：https://dolphinscheduler.apache.org/zh-cn/community/development/submit-code.html
> pr and code style notice：https://dolphinscheduler.apache.org/zh-cn/community/development/pull-request.html

Some query list interfaces return data that is too large. In fact, this is not necessary. Whether Dolphin's storage resources need to be configured with Kerberos for HDFS depends on whether your big data cluster has Kerberos authentication enabled. If Kerberos is not enabled, no configuration is required; Kerberos-related parameters are required if Kerberos authentication is enabled

—-
dolphin的存储资源使用hdfs是否需要配置kerberos，主要看你的大数据集群是否开启kerberos认证。如果没有开启kerberos就不需要配置；如果开启Kerberos认证则需要填写kerberos相关参数

> I think we should'nt use kinit in this context.

In Dolphin, Kerberos Java API is called for authentication, but Kerberos has expired problem. For multi-task nodes and long execution time of workflow, how to ensure that the Kerberos authentication is valid in the entire workflow process? Using Kinit is just one idea to solve Kerberos expiration, but you can also set Kerberos expiration time for a day/two and so on for a long time. Do you have any good ideas?

---
dolphin内是调用kerberos java api 进行认证，但kerberos存在过期问题，针对多任务节点并执行时间很长的工作流，如何保证整个工作流流程中kerberos认证有效? 使用kinit只是解决kerberos过期的一个想法，也可以设置kerberos过期时间1天/2天等很长时间。您有什么好的想法？
